arStrings.szText: {c_important}Pulverize{/c} is now also an {c_important}Earth{/c} Skill. After casting {c_important}Pulverize{/c}, tectonic spikes continue to deal {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.

{c_important}Pulverize{/c} is now also an {c_important}Earth{/c} Skill. After casting {c_important}Pulverize{/c}, tectonic spikes continue to deal {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} damage
